short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Addition to the Kolex.gg website that adds some minor features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kolex Helper

Save time and enhance your collection:

* Efficient Trading: Make informed decisions with real-time price insights.
* Personalized Art: Enjoy your favorite cards offline with MP4 downloads.
* Seamless Access: Log in to Kolex VIP effortlessly with a single click to get your token.

What's New
Version 1.2.0
- Added support for Kings League webapp.
- You can now copy your token from any tab as long as you have an open Kolex or Kings League tab.
